card.name: Bygone Mariner
card.text: When Bygone Mariner enters the battlefield, draw two cards, then discard three cards. {5}: Exile target creature card from your graveyard. Create a token that's a copy of that card except it has decayed and "Tap this creature: Target artifact you control named Bygone Mariner becomes an artifact creature until end of turn."

card.name: Imperial Butterfly
card.text: Whenever Imperial Butterfly attacks, draw a card. Whenever an opponent deals combat damage to you, that player gains control of Imperial Butterfly. Crew 1

card.name: H.S.S. Dreadnought
card.text: Menace Whenever H.S.S. Dreadnought attacks, put a vengeance counter on it, then defending player sacrifices a permanent for each vengeance counter on H.S.S. Dreadnought. Crew 2

card.name: Draco Ligneus
card.text: Flying When Draco Ligneus enters the battlefield or attacks, exile the top card of your library. You may cast that card. When you don't, Draco Ligneus deals 3 damage to up to one target creature, planeswalker, or battle. Crew 3

card.name: The Fell Reaper
card.text: Whenever The Fell Reaper enters the battlefield or attacks, search your library for a Curse card that doesn't share a name with a Curse attached to target opponent and put it onto the battlefield attached to that player, then shuffle. You may tap an untapped planeswalker you control rather than pay The Fell Reaper's crew cost. Crew 4

card.name: The Moon and the Moors
card.text: Whenever The Moon and the Moors attacks, choose any number — • Pay {W}. When you do, return another target nonland permanent you control to its owner's hand. • Pay {2}{U}. When you do, return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand. Crew 2

card.name: The Bones and the Brine
card.text: Whenever The Bones and the Brine attacks, choose any number — • Pay {U}. When you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. • Pay {2}{B}. When you do, each player sacrifices a non-Vehicle creature. Crew 2

card.name: The Spite and the Scorn
card.text: Whenever The Spite and the Scorn attacks, choose any number — • Pay {B}. When you do, The Spite and the Scorn deals 2 damage to defending player. • Pay {2}{R}. When you do, The Spite and the Scorn deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker defending player controls. Crew 2

card.name: The Storm and the Cedar
card.text: Whenever The Storm and the Cedar attacks, choose any number — • Pay {1}{R}. When you do, target creature can't block this turn. • Pay {1}{G}. When you do, target creature you control must be blocked this combat if able. Crew 2

card.name: The Heart and the Soul
card.text: Whenever The Heart and the Soul attacks, choose any number — • Pay {2}{G}. When you do, another target creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn. • Pay {1}{W}. When you do, another target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. Crew 2

card.name: The Mirth and the Misery
card.text: Whenever The Mirth and the Misery attacks, choose any number — • Pay {W}. When you do, target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. • Pay {B}. When you do, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Crew 2

card.name: The Flesh and the Fate
card.text: Whenever The Flesh and the Fate attacks, choose any number — • Pay {B}. When you do, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. • Pay {G}. When you do, discard a creature card. If you do, search your library for a creature card, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Crew 2

card.name: The Earth and the Sea
card.text: Whenever The Earth and the Sea attacks, choose any number — • Pay {G}. When you do, until end of turn, target land you control becomes a 3/3 Elemental creature that's attacking. • Pay {U}. When you do, another target creature or land you control can't be blocked this turn. Crew 2

card.name: The Blood and the Claw
card.text: Whenever The Blood and the Claw attacks, choose any number — • Pay {1}{U}. When you do, target creature defending player controls has base power and toughness 0/1 and loses all abilities until end of turn. • Pay {2}{R}. When you do, target attacking creature you control has base power and toughness 4/4 and gains flying until end of turn. Crew 2

card.name: The Sun and the Spirit
card.text: Whenever The Sun and the Spirit attacks, choose any number — • Pay {1}{R}. When you do, create two 1/1 red Pirate creature tokens that are tapped and attacking. Exile them at end of combat. • Pay {2}{W}. When you do, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Crew 2

card.name: Brine Fleet Bay
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. Crew 3

card.name: The Great Maw
card.text: Whenever The Great Maw attacks, you may pay {4}. If you do, create an 8/8 blue Kraken creature token that's tapped and attacking. That token gains trample and hexproof until end of turn, then exile The Great Maw until that token leaves the battlefield. Crew 2

card.name: Suitor of the Wind
card.text: Whenever Suitor of the Wind attacks, you may pay {WU}{WU}. When you do, tap target noncreature artifact you control. Until end of combat, it becomes a 3/3 artifact creature that's attacking. Crew 1

card.name: The Foul Omen
card.text: Whenever The Foul Omen attacks, you may pay {UB}{UB}. When you do, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens with decayed. (A creature with decayed can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.) Crew 3

card.name: Despair's Emissary
card.text: Whenever Despair's Emissary attacks, you may pay {BR}{BR}. When you do, it deals damage equal to the number of enchantments you control to defending player. Crew 2

card.name: Shining Horizon
card.text: Whenever Shining Horizon attacks, you may pay {RG}{RG}. When you do, create two tapped Treasure tokens. Crew 2

card.name: Frere et Soeur
card.text: Whenever Frere et Soeur attacks, you may pay {GW}{GW}. When you do, distribute two +1/+1 counters among one or two target creatures and/or Vehicles you control. Crew 2

card.name: The Ashen Cross
card.text: Whenever The Ashen Cross attacks, you may pay {WB}{WB}. When you do, return target creature card with mana value 4 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield, then sacrifice that creature. Crew 3

card.name: The Abyssal Pilgrim
card.text: Whenever The Abyssal Pilgrim attacks, you may pay {BG}{BG}. When you do, mill three cards, then you may return a permanent card milled this way to your hand. Crew 1

card.name: Seaskipper
card.text: Whenever Seaskipper attacks, you may pay {GU}{GU}. When you do, create a token that's a copy of target creature you control with mana value 3 or less. Crew 2

card.name: The Scarlet Scourge
card.text: Whenever The Scarlet Scourge attacks, you may pay {UR}{UR}. When you do, create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying that's tapped and attacking. Sacrifice that token at end of combat. Crew 2

card.name: The Huntress
card.text: Whenever The Huntress attacks, you may pay {RW}{RW}. When you do and it's your first combat phase this turn, untap each attacking Vehicle you control. After this combat phase, there is an additional combat phase. Crew 4

card.name: Jolly Drifter
card.text: When Jolly Drifter enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 blue and red Pirate creature tokens. Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Colossal Flagship
card.text: Colossal Flagship can't be blocked by more than one creature. Crew 5 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 5 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Wavewrecker
card.text: Trample Whenever Wavewrecker deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Relentless Destroyer
card.text: When Relentless Destroyer enters the battlefield, destroy target nonland permanent an opponent controls. Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Agile Catamaran
card.text: When Agile Catamaran enters the battlefield under your control, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top. Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Shipping Schooner
card.text: Whenever Shipping Schooner attacks, draw a card, then discard a card. Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Skysail Cutter
card.text: {3}: Skysail Cutter gains flying until end of turn. Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Relentless Galleon
card.text: Menace Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Royal Patroller
card.text: Royal Patroller can't be blocked by creatures with power 1 or less. Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Sea Devil
card.text: {T}: Each opponent loses 1 life. Activate only if Sea Devil is a creature. Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Blood Flag Convoy
card.text: When Blood Flag Convoy enters the battlefield, create a 4/4 colorless Vehicle artifact token with crew 1. Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)
